thread.title: BRIEF-ConvergeOne Q4 Revenue $299.2 Mln Versus $210.5 Mln

title: BRIEF-ConvergeOne Q4 Revenue $299.2 Mln Versus $210.5 Mln

organizations.name: mln reuters staff   convergeone holdings inc

text: March 20, 2018 / 10:04 AM / Updated 22 minutes ago BRIEF-ConvergeOne Q4 Revenue $299.2 Mln Versus $210.5 Mln Reuters Staff   Convergeone Holdings Inc: * CONVERGEONE ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $1.45 BILLION TO $1.55 BILLION * QTRLY NET INCOME PER SHARE ATTRIBUTABLE TO CLASS A COMMON STOCKHOLDERS $0.06 * ‍ADJUSTED EBITDA PER CREDIT AGREEMENT IS EXPECTED IN RANGE OF $155 MILLION TO $165 MILLION FOR FY18 ​ * ‍ ON MARCH 13, BOARD AUTHORIZED INITIATION OF AN ANNUAL CASH DIVIDEND OF $0.08 TO BE PAID QUARTERLY​ * ‍EXPECTS TO MAINTAIN A PROGRAM OF PAYING DIVIDENDS ON A QUARTERLY BASIS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
